text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Admissions and amusement charge" does not include a charge for admission to a political fundraising event.

text.section: "Game of entertainment" includes, in Anne Arundel County or Calvert County, the game of instant bingo permitted under a commercial bingo license.

"Person" includes:
this State or a political subdivision, unit, or instrumentality of this State;
another state or a political subdivision, unit, or instrumentality of that state; and
a unit or instrumentality of a political subdivision of this State or of another state.
"Stadium Authority" means the Maryland Stadium Authority created under § 10-604 of the Economic Development Article.
